provenance_text: Downtown Gallery, New York, as agent, by 1948, until 1968; the artist, until 1971; Hirschl and Adler Galleries, New York, 1971; Janie C. Lee Gallery, Houston, 1975; Jerry Leiber, New York, by 1980; A. W. Mellon Acquisition Endowment Fund, 1980
